about_the_game:
"Gunman Contracts - Stand Alone" is an intense, action-movie inspired shooter playable both in VR and in Non-VR (First Person). In the role of a highly trained professional hitman, known and feared as the "gunman", the player takes on ruthless forces in the criminal underworld, bringing justice and order in the world beyond the reach of law - one contract at a time.



With its origins in the famous Half-Life:Alyx mods Gunman Contracts - Chapter 1 & Chapter 2, "Gunman Contracts - Stand Alone" takes the experience to the next level, with a from the ground up new created singleplayer shooter experience running standalone. With all new contracts (missions) selectable and configurable from the gunmans base of operations, the player can use pistols, rifles, shotguns, knives and even bow&arrow to face its enemies, taking on ruthless criminals, rescuing hostages and thwarting sinister plots.

Please be aware: this version of the game is still incomplete and specifically designed to grow in early-access. It will have bugs and quirks, and will take time to be concluded with additional content (contracts, weapons, challenges etc.), to be the standout action VR shooter eperience its meant to be.

content_descriptors.notes:
Modeld after gun blazing hollywood action thrillers, this game contains content not appropriate for all ages, and may not be appropriate for viewing at work, featuring frequent violence and general mature content.

Note: this game can also be played in a "low violence" mode, which disables nearly all blood effects and splatter, but still keeps the action intact.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500 / Ryzen 5 3600 or better
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 or better
  • VR Support: OpenXR: Standing / Sitting
  • Additional Notes: Development still in progress, all stats are target values and will be updated before release. CPU performance required for physics calculations. Designed for VR, but also playable in Non-VR (First Person Shooter). Requires VR Headset to play in VR.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
